menu_items.name: Breakfast
menu_items.detail: Cheddar Herb Scrambled Eggs, Blueberry Lemon Crepes, Fruity Pebble French Toast, Chilaquiles Verde, Breakfast Sausage Links, Applewood Bacon, Herb Potatoes, Carrot Cake Bread Pudding, Cheddar Biscuits & Country Sausage Gravy, and a Live Chef Omelet Station
